narrative.narrative: Binter Mediterraneo was a subsidiary of Iberia from 1989-1998 when Air Nostrum, a franchise but not subsidiary of Iberia bought it and made it a subsidiary. It was fully absorbed by August 29,2001. It operated five CN-235's and then as part of Nostrum had some ATR 72's. It operated out of Malaga and Madrid and operated at five domestic airports in its last year.
